Technique: ENGOBE; RELIEF; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Lamp
Description: Bitruncate cone-shaped lamp, ovoidal in outline, with a disc marked by a not very pronounced moulding and with a ribbon handle. Pink-coloured paste and surface covered with reddish coating, partially lost. The disc presents a decoration in relief consisting of cruciform motifs. Around the disc we find a Greek inscription in relief. The channel between the disc and the whick is set off by five parallel lines, also in relief. Signs of use in the orifice for light.
